part.name: drillDown
part.valueString: ((reverseResolve(Observation.subject).code.coding.where($this = http://loinc.org|72166-2||'Tobacco smoking status NHIS')) contains http://loinc.org|72166-2||'Tobacco smoking status NHIS') and ((reverseResolve(Observation.subject).valueCodeableConcept.coding) contains http://snomed.info/sct|8517006||'Former smoker')

part.name: drillDown
part.valueString: ((reverseResolve(Observation.subject).code.coding.where($this = http://loinc.org|72166-2||'Tobacco smoking status NHIS')) contains http://loinc.org|72166-2||'Tobacco smoking status NHIS') and ((reverseResolve(Observation.subject).valueCodeableConcept.coding) contains http://snomed.info/sct|266919005||'Never smoker')
